headline.main: TOKYO PAPER URGES MEDIATION OF WAR; Wants Stalin to Surrender, Whereupon Japan Would Aid

lead_paragraph: TOKYO, Tuesday, Oct. 28 -- Pursuing the line of thought recently expressed in an authoritative editorial in the Japan Times Advertiser, the newspaper Miyako urges the Japanese Government to mediate between Russia and Germany in the name of humanity and the "new order."
